From the brand

Thanks for Visiting Mevecco

Handmade Jewelry

ABOUT US

“MEVECCO”—Every one of us experiences unforgettable moments.

It is our goal to design jewelry that not only reflects every kind of women but also every lifestyle.

Focus on 18k gold plated jewelry.

How did we get our start?

MEVECCO was born in 2014 in USA with the purpose to create simple day to day feminine jewelry.

What makes our products unique?

Our jewelry not only emphasizes the beauty of every woman but expresses their personality. The different collections are made of high-quality materials so that they can become faithful companions on their owner’s journey through life.

Why do we love what we do?

We aspire to design small treasures for all women to provide a daily dose of luxury.

Cubic Zirconia Tennis Bracelet

Birth Month Flower Necklace

Nail Bangle Cuff Bracelet

Tiny Initial Disc Anklet

Gift Package

Beautifully packaged and ready for giving. Making a genuine sentimental surprise for special person in your life for any occasions.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99 - $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:00:13 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen!

Whether you’re taking a road trip or commuting to work, if you have a family or spend a lot of time traveling from place to place in your car, having a car trash can is an easy way to keep your vehicle’s interior tidy. We’re all guilty of tossing crumpled-up napkins, crumbs, change into our cup holders. Avoid the buildup of trash with a Vankor car trash can! In order to meet the aesthetics of a wider range of car interior decoration styles and people, we have designed solid and floral pattern. Before launching these car trash bags, we thoroughly checked it for capacity, ease of installation, and additional features, including dual functionality as a car organizer. These auto trash bag will keep you organized and make it easier to throw out your garbage. Okay, Just start your travel now!

Car Trash Can with Lid

Soft lid to put the bottle and other car trash easily. Don’t worry about soiled by unfinished drinks.

Waterproof & Seamless Linning

100% leak-proof lining to ensure your car is dry & neat.

Adjustable Buckle & Strudy Stitching

Car trash bag hanging is designed for most car, trucks, minivans, campers; You can install easily it in somewhere of your car. Strudy Stitching to ensure it has a long service life.

As a Car Trash Can

It is easy to collect wrappers, receipts, and odds and ends in your car. For it to not look dirty and cluttered, keep a car trash can in your car.

As a Car Cooler

These car trash cans are even insulated, which means you can use them as a cooler when traveling to visit family.

As a Storage Bag

Having a garbage can in the car is the best way to storage snacks and food for the car.

Universal Compatibility

Make everywhere clean: the multifunction trash can not only make your car clean and tidy but also hold up lots of garbage or food at some situations like Family Gathering, Journey, Picnic, Camping, Short Trip, Beach and so on.

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 1, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Vankor
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09X36F1ZK

【KEEP YOUR CAR CLEAN】- Are you always bothered by the messy of the car interior? Vankor’s car trash can with lid will help you to solve this annoyance. This cute car trash can will be helpful for keeping your car clutter-free, ensuring you are in a good mood while driving. Large car trash can with an adjustable strap is hung on the gear shift, glove box, headrest. You can also display the hanging car trash bag on the floor, hanging on the back seat, co-driver seat, or any place in your car.
【MULTIPURPOSE STORAGE】- Vankor car garbage can is functional, you can put the car garbage into the main bag, there are 3 outer pouch pockets of garbage can for car that will be great to help storage. You can put tissue packs, wipes, snacks, umbrellas, and other little things that you need to keep in your car to avoid mess, and for easy access. In addition, the waterproof performance also achieves the automotive garbage cans an excellent storage bag when you are camping or picnicking.
【INTIMATE DESIGN & CAPACITY 】- There are 2 side clasps for fixing disposable bags, effectively preventing falling out. Car trash bags have about 2 .5 Gallons for storage of car garbage or other stuff. Car trash bin has 100% leak-proof PEVA thick lining, no spillages will happen and is easy to be cleaned. The extra-large opening is made of elastic soft rubber, very roomy and easier to put litter into the bag, and helps to keep trash from spilling.
【WIDE COMPATIBILITY 】– An thoughtful solution for people who have the need for car neat and car interior storage. Perfectly fits varieties of types of vehicles including sedans, SUVs, RVs, trucks, vans, minivans, boats, campers, taxis, buses, etc. Auto trash can for car is very sturdy and durable, has a long service life, and is very convenient to carry. The car trash can for the back seat is foldable, When you don’t need it, just fold it up without taking up any space.
【STRICT QUALITY CONTROL】- Our company specializes in the portable car trash can for car, and every product is strictly inspected before it goes to the Amazon warehouse. Waterproof car trash can’s pictures are shot with an HD camera to ensure the authenticity of the product colors and details. Vankor aims to provide customers with a better product experience of car trash can bags and offer effective solutions for you.


Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen!

Whether you’re taking a road trip or commuting to work, if you have a family or spend a lot of time traveling from place to place in your car, having a car trash can is an easy way to keep your vehicle’s interior tidy. We’re all guilty of tossing crumpled-up napkins, crumbs, change into our cup holders. Avoid the buildup of trash with a Vankor car trash can! In order to meet the aesthetics of a wider range of car interior decoration styles and people, we have designed solid and floral pattern. Before launching these car trash bags, we thoroughly checked it for capacity, ease of installation, and additional features, including dual functionality as a car organizer. These auto trash bag will keep you organized and make it easier to throw out your garbage. Okay, Just start your travel now!

Soft lid to put the bottle and other car trash easily. Don’t worry about soiled by unfinished drinks.

Waterproof & Seamless Linning

100% leak-proof lining to ensure your car is dry & neat.

Adjustable Buckle & Strudy Stitching

Car trash bag hanging is designed for most car, trucks, minivans, campers; You can install easily it in somewhere of your car. Strudy Stitching to ensure it has a long service life.

It is easy to collect wrappers, receipts, and odds and ends in your car. For it to not look dirty and cluttered, keep a car trash can in your car.

These car trash cans are even insulated, which means you can use them as a cooler when traveling to visit family.

As a Storage Bag

Having a garbage can in the car is the best way to storage snacks and food for the car.

Make everywhere clean: the multifunction trash can not only make your car clean and tidy but also hold up lots of garbage or food at some situations like Family Gathering, Journey, Picnic, Camping, Short Trip, Beach and so on.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.39
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)



WATERPROOF AND REUSABLE: FLOCK THREE car trash bag is made from water-resistant TPU. It is reusable, double layered (both inner and outer) and BPA-free. It is durable with high-quality finishing. It is also machine washable and can be put in dryer.
HOW TO USE THE BAG: Align the bottom edge. Stick the tape fastener bars together. Fold the edge at least 4 times up and snap the buttons together. It can be adjusted to 3 different sizes to suit your needs.
DRAWSTRING TOP AND TAPE FASTENER BOTTOM: The top drawstring is made from nylon rope. You can easily adjust the opening size of the bag with the drawstring to dispose the garbage. The bottom of this bag is stitched left and right with two pieces of tape fastener bars. The tape fastener bottom makes emptying a breeze. Easy to clean and empty.
SNAP BUTTON STRAP: This car trash bag has a handle strap on top of the holder for you to hang them anywhere you like! There are two snap buttons on the strap. The strap is adjustable and allows you to hang it up or take it down hassle-free. The sturdy handle can be easily hung on car seat, armrest, headrest or anywhere inside your car or any other places that you deem fit.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL BAG: This car trash bag is the perfect solution to keep and organise your used plastic grocery bags. It also could also be used to store undergarments, socks, baby washcloths and bibs. It is the best solution for space saving. You can hang it anywhere in the kitchen, bedroom, storeroom or workshop.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:42:59 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;

var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

YGYQZ: Make your mood neat

Storage shelf or bags bring us simple life

4 styles available

4 styles available

How did we get our start?

When I work in the office, I am often too busy to organize the items on the desktop, so that I spend a lot of time looking for the items I want. This feeling makes me very crazy, so I have designed many products, which tidy up my desktop, what’s more, beautify my office as an office decor.

What makes our products unique?

We have spent a long time conducting research, and combined with numerous customer feedback, we continue to improve and update our products. We have always been in the forefront, and we believe that we do better!

Why do we love what we do?

For efficiency

USPTO certified product

Solely designated patent for YGYQZ

Give your books a home: Is there nowhere to put your books, after a while, the book will fall apart, then your books become crumpled, with this small desktop bookshelf, your books will be able to maintain a new look
Saving desktop space in office: Are you still troubled by the clutter of your desk, using our desktop bookshelf can relieve your problems and make your desk tidy and look comfortable
Lightweight and easy to install: Thanks to the simple design, our desktop small bookshelf can be easily installed and disassembled and can be switched horizontally and vertically, you can decide to let the books lie down or stand at will
Perfect adjustable size: 25.6× 6.7× 15.1 in
Quality assurance: If there is a quality problem with the product,we will give you a refund,no need to return,if there is damage caused by non-human factors within 12 months,we will refund it for free
Since it is a factory direct sale, if there are scratches, please ask for replacement
If parts are missing, please ask for replacement
If there is no installation instruction, you can watch our video or ask us for directions


Cartoon cloud pattern bookshelf


Suitable for your books, pens, etc.

item.title: Best Pet Supplies Crinkle Dog Toy for Small, Medium, and Large Breeds, Cute No Stuffing Duck with Soft Squeaker, Fun for Indoor Puppies and Senior Pups, Plush No Mess Chew and Play
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)


Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand up to all the biting, chewing, and tugging. That’s why we created these super cute, high-quality Best Pet Supplies Duck-Shaped Dog Toys with built-in squeaker and crinkle paper. These versatile toys for dogs give them multiple ways to play and stay engaged while satisfying their natural behavioral needs. And because there’s no stuffing you don’t have to worry about cleaning up a big mess the moment your dog rips into them. Product Details: Soft Duck Dog Toy Built-In Squeezable Squeaker Crinkle Paper Interior No Stuffing or Fluff Available in 6 Fun Colors Overall Length: 15”
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.5 x 7.5 x 1.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PT332
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, LLC
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09BBM5CX8
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Cute and Colorful Duck Shape – Shaped like a real duck these dog crinkle toys for small dogs, medium dogs, and every size in between comes in 6 unique colors and provides a more puppy friendly shape that’s easy to carry around
No Fluff, No Mess Design – Unlike messy bones, ropes, or other toys for aggressive chewers these dog crinkle toys won’t leave behind a mess after they’re done playing. They also boast reinforced fabric and stitching to help them hold up to chewing
Active Play, Tossing, and Retrieving – Our cute duck chew toys for dogs can be used for bonding with your puppy, reducing stress or separation anxiety, or simply giving them an active outlet for channeling aggression or intense play


Read more





Cleaning Made Easy

Need to get that toy cleaned from drools or dirt? Just toss it into the washing machine on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low heat.

Soft, Plush, and Durable

We use higher-quality materials in our dog toys to ensure they hold up to regular chewing, biting, tugging, and pulling. If the squeaker or the paper comes out simply discard them and you can continue to let your dog play with the duck for as long as it’s still chewable.

Audible Play Sounds

The crinkle paper in the body and the squeaker in the head give dogs multiple outlets for stimulating their auditory and physical senses. These distinct sounds will keep them having fun far longer than standard toys, so they can relieve stress, stay focused, and even reduce aggressive behaviors.

Adorable Variety

At 15” in size these colorful ducks are more fun for young puppies and older dogs alike because they feature multiple “chew points” and they’re a better shape for carrying.

Read more



4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)

From the brand

YATOJUZI

In Life, You find us a special friend. This will be our great honor.

YATOJUZI is a brand about developing and designing healing crystals , leading the trend in Europe and America; We are dedicated to helping everyone who is stressed in modern society find peace and energy.

We adhere to the business philosophy of “Customer experience first” and the business principle of “Quality first, Integrity first”.We hope to bring customers a comfortable and enjoyable experience and add happiness and joy to their lives.

Source:

In the 21st century, there is a girl who often feels various pressures from work and life, She often felt lost and powerless, At this time she always wanted to hold on something. She hopes to get energy from it to support her. By a chance, she got a worry Stone made of healing crystal. From then on, whenever she felt stressed or sad, she would hold this crystal and rub it. She was surprised to find that her heart gradually calmed down.

The brand “YATOJUZI “was born.

She developed a strong interest in healing crystals, and began to study healing crystals and decided to recommend them to more people.

Crystals and Healing Stones

Healing Crystals

Healing Crystal for Meditation

The more often you program the crystal with this meditation the stronger it’s healing energy will be.

Healing Crystal to divine.

Since crystal divination connects you to your higher self, it can help stimulate your intuition.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.36 x 1.97 x 1.26 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 16, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ YATOJUZI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09XQR7HVJ

[Elephant Symbolize ]:Elephants are revered as a symbol of good luck, prosperity, destroyer of evil, remover of obstacles, as well as strength, power, wisdom, memory, vitality, and gentle soul in a mammoth body.
[Powerful Intellect]The presence of an elephant in your life, whether in real life, the media, or elsewhere, can be a sign of wisdom for you to solve a problem or overcome an obstacle that may be in front of you. While you may feel incredibly emotional about a particular situation, you have a rational mind and are able to make logical decisions.
[Amethyst]:This purple stone is said to be incredibly protective, healing, and purifying. It’s claimed it can help rid the mind of negative thoughts and bring forth humility, sincerity, and spiritual wisdom. It’s also said to help promote sobriety. Sleep is another claimed benefit of this stone, from supposedly aiding in insomnia relief to understanding dreams.
[ After service]: If you have any questions, please tell us , we shall solve for you asap.We hope that all customers who use our crystal can be healed and happy everyday.

Welcome to YATOJUZI！


2 Inch Natural Healing Crystal Stones Elephant Figurine Statue Hand Carved Gemstone Energy Balancing Luck Gifts Collection Decor for Home Office Desk

Introduction to Elephants

Cute Elephants

  • Elephants are the largest existing land animals.
  • Distinctive features of elephants include a long proboscis called a trunk, tusks, large ear flaps, pillar-like legs, and tough but sensitive skin.

Elephant lifestyle

  • Elephants have a fission–fusion society, in which multiple family groups come together to socialise. .
  • Males leave their family groups when they reach puberty and may live alone or with other males.

What do elephants symbolize?

Elephants are revered as a symbol of good luck, prosperity, destroyer of evil, remover of obstacles, as well as strength, power, wisdom, memory, vitality, and gentle soul in a mammoth body.

Suitable Occasion

Pocket Stone

2 inch suite be a pocket stone, perfect size in your palm and easy to carry for pocket or handbag to bring you peace, fortune and positive energy.

Gift Idea

This is a perfect gift all you love, a wonderful Christmas gifts, birthday gift, Housewarming gift for you, your families and your friends.

Desk Decor

Place it on your office desk can attract the positive energy to improve your wealth and lucky in your daily work.

Touching

An elephant symbolizes the ability to draw money from outside.Touching an elephant's trunk can bring money to your life or business.

Different materials have different benefits!!
